long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple browser plugin to save your favourite links in a handy weekly digest, with no fuss and simple tags to help find your stuff.

Inboxpop lets you fire and forget about any link you come across on the web, and then sends you a weekly email containing all the links you've popped that week. Want a reminder about a particular event or something later in the week? No problem - we're the perfect solution. Wait for your best links to come direct to you on Fridays - best of all you can tag your links so you can easily find them that particular digest easily in your email software!

It's complete free to start popping links, it's the productivity plugin you can't live with out.
